verses.verse: And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> both <S%H4480>small<s%> <S%H6996><s%> and <S%H1419>great:<s%> and he <S%H7121>read<s%> in their <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> a <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5315>soul,<s%> to <S%H6965>perform<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that were <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> to the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the second <S%H4932>order,<s%> and the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>door,<s%> to bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>temple<s%> <S%H1964><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were <S%H6213>made<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and for the <S%H842>grove,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> and he <S%H8313>burned<s%> them <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6083>ashes<s%> of them unto <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And he put <S%H7673>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the idolatrous <S%H3649>priests,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>ordained<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the places round <S%H4524>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> them also that burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> to the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and to the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and to the <S%H4208>planets,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And he brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H842>grove<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> it at the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> and stamped it <S%H1854>small<s%> to <S%H6083>powder,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6083>powder<s%> thereof <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And he broke <S%H5422>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H6945>sodomites,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H707>wove<s%> <S%H1004>hangings<s%> for the <S%H842>grove.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> out of the <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> had burned <S%H6999>incense,<s%> from <S%H4480>Geba<s%> <S%H1387><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H884>Beer-sheba,<s%> and broke <S%H5422>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the entering <S%H6607>in<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H376>man's<s%> left <S%H8040>hand<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H389><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> came not <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

And he <S%H2930>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> might <S%H853>make<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> or his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech.<s%>

And he took <S%H7673>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> at the entering <S%H4480>in<s%> <S%H935><s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H5419>Nathan-melech<s%> the <S%H5631>chamberlain,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in the <S%H6503>suburbs,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H4818>chariots<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1406>top<s%> of the upper <S%H5944>chamber<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> did the <S%H4428>king<s%> beat <S%H5422>down,<s%> and broke them <S%H7323>down<s%> from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron.<s%>

And the high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the right <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3225><s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H4889>corruption,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H6253>Ashtoreth<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H6722>Zidonians,<s%> and for <S%H3645>Chemosh<s%> the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites,<s%> and for <S%H4445>Milcom<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> did the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2930>defile.<s%>

And he broke in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4676>images,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H842>groves,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4725>places<s%> with the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was at <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and the high <S%H1116>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H853>made<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> and the high <S%H1116>place<s%> he broke <S%H5422>down,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H853><s%> the high <S%H1116>place,<s%> and stamped it <S%H1854>small<s%> to <S%H6083>powder,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H842>grove.<s%>

And as <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> himself, he <S%H7200>spied<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6913>sepulchers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6913>sepulchers,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H2930>polluted<s%> it, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6725>title<s%> is <S%H1975>that<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>see?<s%> And the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> him, It is the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H4480>Judah,<s%> <S%H3063><s%> and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Let him <S%H5117>alone;<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5128>move<s%> his <S%H6106>bones.<s%> So they let his bones <S%H4422>alone,<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out of <S%H4480>Samaria.<s%> <S%H8111><s%>

And <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> to provoke the LORD to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> took <S%H5493>away,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> to them according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>acts<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

And he <S%H2076>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6213>Keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> there was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>holden<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H6453>passover<s%> from the <S%H4480>days<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> nor in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> nor of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> in the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> wherein <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6453>passover<s%> was <S%H6213>holden<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> the workers with familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> and the <S%H8655>images,<s%> and the <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H7200>spied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> did <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> put <S%H1197>away,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he might <S%H6965>perform<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which were <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And like unto <S%H3644>him<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> there <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3966>might,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H6965>arose<s%> there any like <S%H3644>him.<s%>

Notwithstanding <S%H389><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> from the <S%H4480>fierceness<s%> <S%H2740><s%> of his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>wrath,<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3708>provocations<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had <S%H3707>provoked<s%> him withal.
